Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Connector corrosion causing signal degradation. Defect found during scheduled
maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 19/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
